tool_description: Detail of Airports (IATA and no IATA, ICAO, and FAA)... search, geolocalisation, itinerary, distance, contact... you can also search for heliport, balloonport, seaplane base or closed field.
name: IATA ICAO Airport Heliport
title: IATA ICAO Airport Heliport

api_list.name: Search distance
api_list.description:
Search airports arround a geo point.
Specify Latitude, Longitude. You can specify a distance, by default it's 30km arround.

optional_parameters.name: sType
optional_parameters.description:
You can shoose what airports you want to liste :
one or more values separated by coma :
SMALL_AIRPORT
MEDIUM_AIRPORT
LARGE_AIRPORT
CLOSED
SEAPLANE_BASE
BALLOONPORT
HELIPORT

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://iata-icao-airport-heliport.p.rapidapi.com/SearchProxiAirport/0.15/2.15/30/LARGE_AIRPORT,MEDIUM_AIRPORT"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "iata-icao-airport-heliport.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://iata-icao-airport-heliport.p.rapidapi.com/SearchProxiAirport/{xlatitude}/{xlongitude}/{ndistance}/{stype}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "iata-icao-airport-heliport.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search by ICAO
Search by IATA code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://iata-icao-airport-heliport.p.rapidapi.com/SearchCodeIATA/CDG"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "iata-icao-airport-heliport.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://iata-icao-airport-heliport.p.rapidapi.com/SearchCodeIATA/{iata}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "iata-icao-airport-heliport.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
